reviews.text:
A good enough station with step free access via Lifts, a ticket office and both fast and stopper trains but expect a literal rush hour crush with the ridiculous amount of passengers using this station in the mornings and evenings. Local buses to Kingston, Tolworth, Hook and Dorking stop right outside of the station.

EDIT: Dropped a star due to the absolutely shocking behaviour witnessed by the new security staff that override the automatic announcements, pester passengers and show no respect to SWR staff. Disgusting.
There are two staffed ticket office with ticket machines. Cover platforms. Station that's a very good service
Not the best of stations, but definitely handy. There are usually staff for information and trains are frequent. Not great for disabled access.
Hi .not recommended,I'm waiting one hour !staf of station is done!

reviews.author_name: London Flareon Tokyo Ebisu - Swanslade 恵比寿-スワンズレイド
reviews.text: Surbiton is located in the town with the same name and is used by Southwest trains, Surbiton is a great station, it is staffed, trains stop often, it is almost spotless, the station though could use a little work.
